Advocate Groups.title: AlgorithmWatch
Advocate Groups.description: AlgorithmWatch is a non-profit research and advocacy organization focused on algorithmic decision-making and the use of artificial intelligence in a variety of domains.

Advocate Groups.title: The Public Voice
Advocate Groups.description: The Public Voice is a coalition created by the nonprofit Electronic Privacy Information Center (EPIC) that advocates for public participation in decisions concerning the future of the Internet.

Advocate Groups.title: Electronic Privacy Information Center (EPIC)
Advocate Groups.description: The Electronic Privacy Information Center (EPIC) is a non-profit research organization that focuses on policy, advocacy, and litigation for digital rights.

Advocate Groups.title: All Tech Is Human
Advocate Groups.description: All Tech Is Human is a non-profit that does work in the intersection of technology and society.

Advocate Groups.title: Privacy International (PI)
Advocate Groups.description: Privacy International (PI) is an international charity that works in the space of technology and human rights.

Advocate Groups.title: Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF)
Advocate Groups.description: The Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF) is a non-profit that promotes digital privacy and free speech.

Advocate Groups.title: The Internet Society
Advocate Groups.description: The Internet Society is a global nonprofit working toward the development of standards and protocols for the Internet with a focus on trust, transparency, and security.

Coding Tools.title: JupyterLite
Coding Tools.description: Python Read-Evaluate-Print-Loop that can be embedded in a webpage as an iframe
